framework_intro.para: 写投诉信时，建议采用以下结构。将信的要点和内容填写到相应位置。

commentary.para: 写正式信函时需要记住的重点之一是格式，它有其惯用的格式；二是语言，用语必须是正式或半正式的，而且要有礼貌，即使是表达不满亦应如此。信的内容应结构清晰，符合逻辑。
以下是这封信所采用的结构。
右上角写上写信人的地址，不写姓名。
左边写收信人的姓名、职衔和地址。
日期放在左边或右边地址的下方均可，或放在左边地址的上方。也可以用 August 1, 2014、1/8/14（英式英语），或 8/1/14（美式英语）。
写信人不知道收信人姓名，所以开头用 Dear Sir or Madam，结尾用 Yours faithfully。
写信前先列出各段的要点。
使用投诉信的关键词或短语。

checklist.point: 按照本结构组织自己的投诉信的要点。
确保开头称呼和结尾相符。
写信人地址（而不是姓名）的位置正确吗？
收信人姓名和地址的位置正确吗？
第一段说明写信的原因了吗？
说清楚自己希望对方采取什么行动了吗？（如会面、某些信息、补偿等）
开头称呼（Dear…）和结尾（Yours…）一致吗？
检查用词、语法和拼写了吗？

paragraph.name: 写信人地址
paragraph.tip: 右上角写上写信人的地址，不写姓名。

content.prompt: 在这里键入写信人地址

paragraph.name: 收信人姓名／头衔和地址
paragraph.tip: 提示：左边写收信人的姓名、职衔和地址。如果用美国格式写信，则用美式拼写和标点符号，如 Mrs.、Dr. 等。

content.prompt: 在这里键入姓名和地址

paragraph.name: 日期
paragraph.tip: 提示：日期放在左边或右边地址的下方均可，或放在左边地址的上方。可以写成 August 1, 2014、1/8/14（均为英式英语），或 8/1/14（美式英语）。

content.prompt: 在这里键入今天的日期

paragraph.name: 称呼
paragraph.tip: 提示：如果不知道收信人姓名，用 Dear Sir or Madam。如果知道姓名，使用以下格式：Dear Ms Klein、Dear Mr Smith。如果不知道性别，可以用 Dear Chris White，但不要同时使用头衔和名字。如果按美国格式写信而且不知道收信人姓名，可以用 To whom it may concern。

paragraph.name: 参照信息
paragraph.tip: 提示：可以用标题，如 Poor service levels（服务质量差）。

notes.para: We were passengers on flight LZ238 from London to Orlando, USA - July 23rd 2014. Want to complain about the service - several aspects.

content.para: My wife and I and our two children, aged 2 and 4, were passengers on flight LZ238 from London to Orlando, USA on July 23rd 2014. I am writing to complain about a number of aspects of the service we received.

paragraph.name: 第 2 段
paragraph.desc: 说明问题和自己所受的影响。

notes.para: When plane delayed, staff at the information desk were unhelpful. We were not given a voucher for a drink or meal - delay would be at least seven hours. So had to spend a large amount of money in the restaurant.

content.para: Firstly, when the flight was delayed, the staff at the airline's information desk were very unhelpful. We were not even given a voucher for a drink or meal, when it was clear the delay would be at least seven hours. This meant that we had to spend a considerable amount of money in the restaurant.

notes.para: When able to board, families were not allowed to board first - but we had paid for this. So we were not able to sit together - children became distressed.

content.para: Then, when we were finally able to board, families were not allowed to board first, although we had paid for this. As a result we were not able to sit together, making our children, already very tired, extremely distressed.

paragraph.name: 第 4 段
paragraph.desc: 清楚提出自己希望公司采取的行动。

notes.para: Legal requirement for airline operators to provide refreshments if there is a delay. I expect compensation for this and no priority boarding although paid for.

content.para: It is a legal requirement for airline operators to provide suitable refreshments in the event of a delay. I would therefore expect some compensation for your failure both to comply with this regulation and to provide us with the priority boarding for which we had paid.

paragraph.name: 结束语
paragraph.desc: 概要评论。表明你希望尽快得到答复。

notes.para: Enclose boarding passes and look forward to hearing from you shortly.

content.para: I enclose our boarding passes andlook forward to hearing from you shortly.

paragraph.name: 结尾
paragraph.desc: 签名并在下方打印姓名。提供任何其他联系方式，如电邮。
paragraph.tip: 提示：如果开头使用 Dear + 名字，结尾要用 Yours sincerely。如果开头使用 Dear Sir or Madam，结尾则用 Yours faithfully。美国格式的结尾用 Sincerely、Sincerely yours（如果开头用了Dear + 名字），或 Yours truly。

content.prompt: 键入 Yours sincerely、Yours faithfully 等和写信人的姓名
